name: 施欣文
objective:
本課程幫助學生習得敘述、描寫、推論、議論、省思、說明等文體方面的寫作技巧，並指導學生從閱讀、圖片、日常生活事件，及課堂討論內容中取材，以加強邏輯思考和流暢寫作能力。

This course continues teaching students how to make an argument suitable for academic papers. In the spring semester, we will practice particularly with making a film analysis, along with other assignments.
schedule:
Please see the syllabus for the exact week-by-week details. 

There will be at least three papers and a final exam. 

We will also keep working on logic, voice, and style.
scorePolicy:
Formal Papers: 55%
Class Participation: 10%
Quizzes: 15%
Informal Writing Assignments and Homework: 15%
Peer Reviews: 5%
